loans.name: Suchitra

texts.en:
Suchitra is a 31-year-old rural woman. Unfortunately, she was deprived of education in her young age due to her parents' lack of economic resources. She is married now. Her husband, Sudhanshu, is a farmer. Suchitra is the mother of two sons; both are in school. They live in Baganbari village in Falakata of West Bengal.

Suchitra's husband has been a paddy rice grower for years. Paddy being a staple of the region, the demand for it has always been good. Suchitra tries to help her husband in his farm work.Together the couple has been working hard to earn a livelihood since this is their sole source of income. They have been selling the produce in the local town market. They struggle hard to grow good quality paddy rice to satisfy their customers, but their earning is not as much as they expect. The land they cultivate is very fertile and productive, so, they have decided to expand the volume of their paddy cultivation. The main obstacle is capital.

Now Suchitra is seeking a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase agricultural supplies such as seeds, manure, etc. She hopes the additional business will earn good profit. Her goals are to strengthen her family business and provide a better education to her sons. Her desire is to purchase more plots of land for expanding their agricultural business.

She thanks her lenders for helping her financially.

loans.use: To purchase farm supplies for paddy cultivation.

loans.name: Sandhyarani

texts.en:
Sandhyarani is a woman of 29 years. She lives with her husband and two children (a son and a daughter) in a small village of Falakata. She and her husband completed their educations till grades 5 and 8. 

Her husband has been running a business of selling tea in a movable stall. Sandhyarani gives full assistance to her husband so that he can run the business smoothly.  Every morning she makes tea, which her husband sells from his shop. His main customers are the villagers, neighbors, friends and passersby. This small business is the only income-generating source for the family, and it hardly covers the household expenses. He has to purchase items for making tea on a regular basis from the wholesale dealers, which unnecessarily increases costs in both finance and labour. 

Now Sandhyarani and her husband want to increase their stock of tea-making products to increase their production for more income. But their main challenge is capital.

Hearing from her rural neighbors about BJS (Kiva’s partner), Sandhyarani took a loan to purchase the required tea-making products such as tea leaves, sugar, milk and other items in bulk for their tea-selling business. Sandhyarani hopes this will help to increase her family's income for materializing her dreams of constructing a concrete house in the future.

She is grateful to both Kiva and BJS.

loans.use: To purchase necessary ingredients in a bulk for her husband's tea stall.

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: Francisco tiene 60 años y vive junto a la persona que le ha acompañado por casi toda su vida, su esposa Dominga. Ambos se de dedican únicamente a la agricultura orgánica. Solicita el micro crédito para poder pagar la maquinaria y mano de obra para realizar la cosecha de su cultivo orgánico de quinua. Javier espera que en el futuro pueda mejorar su casa para que viva mas cómodamente con su pareja y darle a Dominga estabilidad económica en retribución por tanto apoyo y comprensión que le ha dado siempre.
texts.en: Francisco is 60 years old and lives with the person who has accompanied him for almost his whole life, his wife, Dominga. Both are solely dedicated to organic farming. He is requesting the microloan to be able to pay for machinery and labor to harvest his organic quinoa crop. Javier hopes that in the future he can improve his house so he can live more comfortably with his spouse and give Dominga economic stability in return for the support and understanding that she has always given him.

loans.use: to harvest quinoa.

loans.name: Niyati

texts.en:
Niyati is a rural housewife of 27 years of age. She is from the small town of Falakata in West Bengal. Her husband, Swapan, who is 33 years old, is completely engaged in cultivation. They have one daughter, who is a preschooler. 

Niyati's husband has been cultivating seasonal crops on their own plot of land. He gives hard labor to grow good-quality crops, which he sells in the local market. He is the only earning member of the family. His main challenge is to give the family better living conditions, which he cannot give with his small income. So Niyati and her husband have decided to start cultivation of teasel gourd. Summer is the right season to cultivate teasel gourd, so they want to cultivate the crop and expect a good harvest in this season.

Niyati has taken a loan from BJS to purchase seeds, fertilizers and other farm supplies to cultivate teasel gourds. She hopes to get excellent revenues from this cultivation. She has a long-cherished dream of constructing a concrete house, which she hopes to fulfill with the profits.

She is thankful to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase seeds and fertilizers for cultivation of teasel gourds.

loans.name: Anorbi

texts.ru: 51 летняя семейная женщина Анорби. У нее 2 сыновья и 2 дочери. Муж строитель. Ему 53 года. Сыновьям 28 и 22 года. Дочкам 25 и 18 лет. Невестке 24 года. Старший сын занимается таксистом в городе. Младший сын студент, он учится в университете. Старшая дочка работает медсестрой в больнице вместе невесткой. Младшая дочка занята торговлей.  У Анорби прекрасная семья. Сама Анорби 5 лет занята торговлей деятельностью. Она на рынке продает детские одежды. Анорби научилась заниматься торговлей у соседа. Ее все соседи почти занимаются торговлей деятельностью. Аноби планирует перевозить больше детскую одежду и расширить свою деятельность. Для завершения данной операции ей нужны деньги. Из-за нехватки денег Анорби просит кредит.
texts.en:
This 51 year old family woman is Anorbi. She has two sons and two daughters. Her husband is a builder. He is 53 years old. Her sons are 28 and 22 years old. Her daughters are 25 and 18 years old. Her daughter-in-law is 24 years old. 

Her older son works as a taxi driver in the city. Her younger son is a college student studying at university. Her older daughter works as a nurse in the hospital, together with her daughter-in-law. Her younger daughter is engaged in sales. 

Anorbi has a wonderful family. Anorbi started her own retail business herself, five years ago. She sells children's clothes at the market. Anorbi got the idea of starting her business from her neighbour. Almost all her neighbours work in the retail business. 

Anorbi plans to transport more children's clothes and expand her business. In order to fulfill this, she needs money. As a result of this lack of funds, Anorbi is appealing for a loan.

loans.use: to transport children's clothes and expand her business.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca is 45 years old, married to Okindo, and supports five children. She has been a shopkeeper for the last 7 year and the business earns her 11,000 KES per month. 

She has applied for her first loan of 25,000 KES from Vision Fund Kenya to purchase stocks of goods such as sugar, cooking fat, and soaps for resale. This will help her to meet both client and family needs.

She plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and educate her children. Her hope is to be financially stable and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase stocks of goods such as sugar, cooking fat, and soaps to sell in her shop.

loans.name: Ider Leonidas

texts.es: Ider es un hombre de 30 años que vive en la localidad de Quillunza en Arequipa, vive junto a su pareja Erica y sus dos pequeños hijos, que van a la escuela de su localidad. Ider se dedica a la agricultura orgánica porque le generará un ingreso económico mayor en el mercado y ocasionalmente trabaja como peón agrícola, este ultimo trabajo no es inestable. Ider necesita apoyo para poder pagar ayudantes para realizar la cosecha de su kiwicha orgánica, es por ello que solicita el micro crédito. En el futuro Ider espera poder darle a su familia una estabilidad económica y poder darle a su familia una casa cómoda donde puedan vivir.
texts.en:
Ider is a 30 year-old man who lives in the town of Quillunza in Arequipa. He lives with his partner Erica and their two small children who go to school in town.

Ider works in organic agriculture because it will generate greater economic income for him than in the market. He occasionally works as a farmhand; this job is not unstable. Ider needs support to be able to pay assistants for the harvest of his organic amaranth, and it is for this that he is requesting the loan.

In the future, Ider hopes to be able to give his family economic stability and to be able to give his family a comfortable house where they can live.

loans.use: to harvest his crop of organic amaranth.

loans.name: Papi

texts.en:
Papi, 29, lives with her husband in Falakata in West Bengal, India. She studied up to graduation level. Now she is married to Biswajit. 

Papi’s husband runs a small grocery store from their house. Papi also deals with the customers in the absence of her husband. They sell general grocery items like rice, salt, sugar, oil, lentils, biscuits etc. in their store. But there is tough completion in the market as there are other grocery shops in the village.  Papi wants to expand their business by stocking up more items in the store, which will attract more customers. But Papi does not have sufficient capital to invest in the business. 

Thus she applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to increase her business. She will use the loan to buy more stocks of grocery items. She hopes this loan will give a boost in her business as well as in their income. Papi is dedicated to making her business successful and providing financial sustenance to her family. She thanks her lenders for their kind support.

loans.use: To buy more stocks for their existing grocery store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy spare parts for maintaining her posh mill to gain more income.

loans.name: Anjali

texts.en:
Anjali lives at a small village named Harinathpur of Falakata in West Bengal. She is 32 years old, a hardworking mother of two children (one son and one daughter). She got a limited education in her young age due to her family's financial issues. Her husband's occupation is farming and he works hard to meet the family needs. Her children are studying in grade 9 and grade 7.

Anjali's husband cultivates beans, gourds, cabbages, peas, and other seasonal vegetables to sustain his family. During busy seasons, Anjali also tries to help her husband in cultivation after managing her household chores. The crops they grow are sold in the market and the business is their main source of income. The income generated by this agricultural business is almost all spent on household expenses.

Now they have decided to grow teasel gourd, which is very popular as a summer crop. Anjali wants to get a huge profit from the cultivation of this crop in the summer season. So she wants to buy the necessary farm supplies and applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner, BJS.  She will purchase good quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides for teasel gourd cultivation. She hopes this will improve her family’s financial condition, and she will be able to open a grocery store in future with the profit generated by this cultivation.

Anjali is thankful to her lenders for their help.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies for teasel gourd cultivation.

loans.name: Mavzuna

texts.ru:
Мавзуна 36 летняя жена и мать одного ребенка. Она проживает в районе Гиссар. Мавзуна дома  воспитывает  ребенка и одновременно ведет свое швейное дело.  У нее 1 летный ребенок.  
Мавзуна недавно научилась шить и кроить женскую одежду. Она быстро освоила все навыки, чтобы скорее начать зарабатывать и улучшить финансовое состояние семьи. Вот уже 5 лет она у себя дома занимается данным видом бизнеса. Мавзуна берет кредит для купли новой швейной машинки, чтобы ускорить процесс работы, и привлечь себе больше клиентов.  Этот кредит поможет ей не потерять источник дохода и расширить деятельность. У нее мечта в будущем открыть себе новую торговую точку шитья национальной женской одежды, и взять учеников.
texts.en:
Mavzuna is a 36 year old wife and mother of one. She lives in the Gissar area. Mavzuna takes care of her child at home and simultaneously conducts her own sewing business. Her child is one years old. 

Mavzuna learned to sew and cut women's clothes a while ago. She quickly mastered all the skills, in order to start earning money and improving the family financial conditions faster. She has been doing this work from home for the past five years. 

Mavzuna is taking a loan to buy a new sewing machine so that she can speed up her work and attract more clients. This loan will help her to keep her source of income and expand her business. Her dream in the future is to open her own new retail store sewing national women's clothes, and to take on apprentices.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine so that she can work faster.

loans.name: Hamida

texts.en:
Hamida lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is widowed, and she takes care of five additional family members. 

Hamida sells used clothes at the market and has been in this business for the last 13 years working seven days a week. She has requested a loan from MCDT SACCO to buy bales of used clothes. Hamida's major challenge includes seasonality and transportation. 

Hamida's goal and aspiration is to build permanent business premises. She lives in her own house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: to buy a bale of used clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to supply more milk.

loans.name: Evelina

texts.es:
Evelina tiene 32 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 1 hijo, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural en el distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y venta de ropa , hace 15 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo; compra de perfumes, colonias,y ropa entre otros el prestamo le permitirá tener una mayor inversión, esto con la finalidad de hacer crecer su negocio y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes, con esto Evelina tendrá mayores ingresos por lo tanto podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Evelina tiene 32 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, tiene 1 hijo, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural en el distrito de Oyotún que se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en este distrito se desarrolla tranquilamente, los pobladores se dedican principalmente a la agricultura y crianza de animales.

Ella se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y venta de ropa , hace 15 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio, solicita préstamo para capital de trabajo; compra de perfumes, colonias,y ropa entre otros el prestamo le permitirá tener una mayor inversión, esto con la finalidad de hacer crecer su negocio y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes, con esto Evelina tendrá mayores ingresos por lo tanto podrá mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Evelina is 32 years old, in a common-law marriage, and has one child. She lives in a family home in the rural zone of the Oyotún district, located in the Chiclayo province, in the Lambayeque region on the north cost of Peru. Life in this district plays out calmly. The population works mainly in agriculture and animal husbandry. She has been working selling beauty products and clothes for 15 years. Her business is located in her home. She is requesting a loan for the capital to purchase perfumes, colognes, and clothes, among other items. The loan will allow her make a greater investment, with the purpose of making her business grow and satisfying the needs of her customers. With this, Evelina will be able to have higher income and therefore be able to improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: have the capital to purchase perfumes, colognes, and clothes, among other items.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
Pablo tiene 36 años de edad, vive en casa propia de material rustico, con su conyugue y sus tres menores hijos.Pablo vive 10 años en este distrito, en la parte rural contando con servicios de agua y luz. Dicho distrito esta ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región de Cajamarca, sierra norte de Perú.

La actividad que realiza es el transporte de pasajeros mediante mototaxi, cuenta con movilidad propia, la actividad la realiza en su caserio asi como caserios aledaños. Cuenta con mas de 3 años de experiencia dedicándose a este rubro, con buena referencias por parte de los moradores de la zona.

El destino del crédito será para invertir en su negocio, en hacer arreglos a su movilidad, con ello le generará mayores ingresos y así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Pablo is 36 years old. He lives in his own house made of rustic materials with his spouse and three minor children. Pablo has lived in this district for 10 years in the rural part that has running water and electricity services. This district is located in the province of Jaén, Cajamarca region in the North Andes of Peru.

His business is transporting passengers on his motorcycle taxi. He has his own unit. He does his business in his village as well as in the neighboring communities. He has more than 3 years experience in this field and has good references from the inhabitants of the area.

The loan will be invested in his business in making repairs on his unit. Doing this he will generate greater income and be able to improve his quality of living.

loans.use: to repair his work equipment.

loans.name: Wafaa

texts.en:
Wafaa is a divorced woman with one child. She is conservative woman and asked her brother to take her place in the photo instead her. She is an amazing and hard working woman. She wants to help her husband in the household expenses and in paying the tuition fees for her child; she is really an example of a woman who has willpower. 

She started her business, which is grocery store. She is running her own business by herself and she likes what she does. She wants to expand her work and increase her income to live comfortably with her family. Therefore, she requested a loan to buy food supplies and more kinds of vegetables and fruits to sell and achieve her dreams.

loans.use: to buy food supplies and more kinds of vegetables and fruits to sell.

loans.name: Saeed

texts.en:
Saeed is 57 years old, married, and blessed with six children. He operates a barber shop. Saeed started this business 10 years ago and this is not the first loan he has applied for.

He applied for this loan to equip his business with shaving machines to serve more customers and develop his shop to attract more customers. He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay his loan.

His future hope is to better his life.

loans.use: to equip his business with shaving machines to serve more customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase a water filtration system to provide clean drinking water for its students.

loans.name: Limbanazo Group

texts.en:
A 58-year-old woman, Lucy sells kitchen materials so she can financially support her family. She is married with seven children, and only three of her children go to school. When she gets the loan, she wants to buy more commodities for her business such as pots, plates, and cups. Her goal is to create a home where food and other basic needs are sufficient. 

She hopes to live her life in peace where food will no longer be a struggle to her.

loans.use: to buy kitchenware to sell.

loans.name: Shrabanti

texts.en:
Shrabanti, 41, lives in the village of Raychenga at Alipurduar with her husband, Bidyut, and three children (two sons and one daughter). Her daughter is married, one son reads in village higher secondary school (grade 12) and the other works in a medicine store. 

Shrabanti and her husband run a snack stall locally named "Chops" (a kind of very tasty deep-fried item in which vegetables are stuffed into a batter).  These snacks are very popular among the people of their locality. As a housewife, Shrabanti looks after the family, and after managing all the household work, she assists her husband in making these snacks. Her husband sells these items from his stall to his neighbors and local area people. 

Shrabanti knows that this business will produce sufficient revenue, but for continued operation she needs some capital. So she requested a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to purchase necessary ingredients like gram flour, oil, vegetables, spices, sauce, and different necessary resources so that she can fulfill her customers' needs. 

She dreams of enhancing the business so that the increased profit generated by the business will help them to open a restaurant in the near future.

Shrabanti is grateful to her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase necessary ingredients for her snacks selling business.

loans.name: Meriniso

texts.ru: Меринисо уроженка города Куляб. Ей 53 года. Она мать двоих детей. Дочкам 24 и 20 лет. Старшая дочка замужем и она работает учительницей в школе. Младшая дочка занимается торговлей на рынке. Меринисо в городе живет вместе младшей дочери. Она на рынке занимается приготовлением пище для продавцов. Она варить чай, кофе и жарить картофель, и приготовить другие пищи. Меринисо арендовала место, и хочет открыть свою столовую (быстро приготовления), и купить посуды для приготовления. Для оплаты место аренды и для купли необходимые средств у Меринисо нет сумма денег. С такими планами она обратилась за кредитом. Помогите ей достичь своих целей.
texts.en:
Meriniso is a native of Kulyab city. She is 53 years old. She is the mother of two children. Her daughters are 24 and 20 years old. Her older daughter is married and works as a school teacher. Her younger daughter is engaged in retail at the market. 

Meriniso lives in the city with her younger daughter. Her job is to prepare food for the vendors at the market. She makes tea and coffee, fries potatoes, and cooks other dishes. 

Meriniso has rented a space and wants to open her own canteen (fast food), and also wants to buy cooking utensils. Meriniso does not have the needed amount of money to pay the space rental and to buy the utensils. With these plans in mind, she has applied for a loan. Help her to achieve her goals!

loans.use: to pay for space rental and to buy cooking utensils.

loans.name: Tobusbi

texts.ru: 56-летняя Тобусби проживает в городе Куляб. Она энергичная, усердная женщина, имеющая собственный бизнес. В течение 20 лет года Тобусби занимается выпечкой лепешки, ее место продажа расположена рядом с рынком, где всегда полно народу. Она печет и продает вкусные горячие лепешки. За счет бизнеса Тобусби получает ежедневный доход, который позволяет ей поддерживать семью. Тобусби развелась с мужем, и является матерью двоих сыновей. У нее двое сыновей и одна невестка. Сыновья занимаются мастером по ремонту домов. Тобусби сейчас нуждается в кредите для продолжения деятельности. Она на сумму запрашиваемого кредита хочет купить запас муки и дрова. Ваша поддержка поможет ей и дальше продолжать свое любимое дело и не остаться без источника дохода.
texts.en: 56-year-old Tobusbi lives in the city of Kulob. She is an energetic, diligent woman with her own business. Tobusbi has been baking flatbreads for 20 years. Her sales point is situated next to a market which is always full of people. She bakes and sells tasty hot flatbreads. Tobusbi receives a daily income from the business which allows her to support her family. Tobusbi is divorced, and is the mother of two children. She has two sons and a daughter-in-law. Her sons house renovation foremen. Tobusbi now needs a loan to continue her work. She wants to buy a stock of flour and firewood with the requested loan. Your support will help her to keep doing her beloved job in the future and not end up without a source of income.

loans.use: to buy a stock of flour and firewood.

loans.name: Reo

texts.en:
Reo is 54 years old, married, and supports four family members. He has been a farmer for the last 23 years, earning 10,000 KES per month. 

Reo requested his first loan from VisionFund Kenya for 25,000 KES, which he will use to purchase fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to increase nutrients in the soil for a better harvest. The loan will allow him to meet his clients' and his family's needs. His hope is to be financially stable and expand his agricultural sector. He plans to use the anticipated profits to repay the loan and start a retail shop.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Parbati

texts.en:
Parbati, 46 years old,  is from a small village called Barodoba in Falakata. She lives there with her husband and three children (a son and two daughters). Parbati ended her education in grade 5 due to her family’s financial issues but she is very much concerned about her children’s education. Two of her children are studying in grades 6 and 11 while the other one is too small to go to school.

While being a housewife, Parbati manages her livestock business carefully, and her husband Sudeb is engaged in cotton weaving work. Parbati raises lambs with adequate nutrition, housing, and care to grow into a healthy, productive adult sheep.  After maturing, the sheep are sold at the village markets for their meat. The couple works tirelessly to earn their livelihood but their income is not satisfactory to meet the family’s household expenses along with the children’s education costs. So Parbati wants to buy more lambs so that she can sell more and increase her income. For this she applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner).

She hopes the profit generated from the business will increase as well as her financial conditions so that she can provide good education to her children and a secure life to her family.

She conveys her gratitude to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase lambs (baby sheep) for her livestock business.

loans.name: Basanti

texts.en:
Basanti is a 47-year-old married woman who lives with her husband and five daughters in a small village called Parengerpar at Falakata, Alipurduar district of West Bengal.  Two of her daughters are still students and the others got married. 

Basanti, along with her husband, runs a snack business. They have been making "Chanachur," a traditional Indian salty snack, for several years. It is a tasty snack which is often eaten with puffed rice at tiffin time. Basanti prepares the snack at home and  her husband sells it in small packets to the local shops or door to door. The product has a good demand in their local area. Due to shortage of business capital, they are unable to purchase enough ingredients to increase production, so their income is also very scanty and it hardly covers all the necessary expenses of her large family. 

To expand the business Basanti has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner BJS to purchase raw materials like lentils , spices, cooking oil, besan (gram flour), maida (finely milled and refined wheat flour), etc. in bulk for preparing more tasty “Chanachur”.  She hopes that she can sell more and can increase her revenues which will help her to save enough to give her daughters higher education and strengthen the family economy. She dreams of constructing a concrete house of their own in future.

Her full thanks go to BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To buy necessary raw ingredients for making 'Chanachur," a traditional Indian snack.

loans.name: Taghreed

texts.en:
Taghreed is a young married woman, she is 19 years old with one child. She is working hard to help her husband as a farmer and she operates a retail business where she sells clothes and blankets, actually she is very young to take on such responsibility.
She has been involved in this business for one year. Taghreed's business is located in her home, and her primary customers are regular. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of finances. She requested a loan to buy more kinds of clothes and blankets to sell. Her business goal is to open a boutique within five years. Taghreed hopes that in the future she will have a better life.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and blankets to sell.

loans.name: Gita

texts.en:
Gita is a 26-year-old woman from the remote village of Harinathpur in Alipurduar district, where she lives with her husband and two children. Both Gita and her husband are uneducated, and can sign their names only. One of her children has started attending school. Gita's husband runs a modest grocery store to provide the basic household consumables to their customers. 

He sells rice, grains, lentils, edible oil, spices, biscuits, soap, detergent, hair oil, etc. in his shop. He has developed a very good relationship with their customers in the village. Gita also helps her husband with this business. They have a plan to make their shop bigger and keep multiple things in their shop to satisfy the customers. 

Thus Gita has taken a loan from BJS (a Kiva partner), with which she will be able to purchase stocks of grocery items in bulk at lower rates from the wholesale market. This will help them steadily grow their small grocery store; they expect an increase in their monthly profits in the immediate future. This loan will help Gita's family to take the first step towards a financially secure and stable future.

Gita is grateful to her generous lenders for the loan.

loans.use: To purchase more grocery items for their grocery shop.

loans.name: Roqiya

texts.ru: Ее зовут Рокия. Ей 54 года. Рокия живет на районе Кубадиён и здесь же работает. Она занимается животноводством. Рокия держится за свою работу, это основная деятельность в семье. Рокия около 3 лет год работает в этой сфере деятельности и научилась тонкостям своей работы. Рокия хочет расширить деятельность и потому она обратилась за кредитом. Благодаря кредиту, она сможет увеличить поголовья скотин. Рокия без заемных средств не сможет осуществить свой план и единственный выход она видит в получении кредита.
texts.en: This woman is called Roqiya. Roqiya lives in the Qubadiyon region and works here too. She rears animals. Roqiya clings to this work - it is the main activity for the family. Roqiya has been working in this sphere of activity for about three years and has learned the finer points of her job. Roqiya wants to expand her business and so she has applied for a loan. Thanks to the loan, she will be able to increase the size of her herd. Roqiya will not be able to carry out her plan without borrowed funds and the only solution she sees is to receive a loan.

loans.use: to buy a couple of heads of cattle to expand her business.

loans.name: Johanna Josefa

texts.es:
Johanna es una joven carismática que tiene mucho amor por el trabajo, ella decidió emprender su primer negocio explotando su talento en la cocina, con el apoyo de su mama se aventuró a poner una pizzería en su casa de habitación. Ella ya había sido beneficiada con un crédito de Kiva junto a MiCrédito, con el cual compro una vitrina de exhibición y la materia prima para hacer las pizzas. 
Ahora que su negocio es muy rentable, desea crecer, es por eso que ha solicitado un nuevo préstamo que le permita comprar sillas y mesas, para brindarles a sus clientes más comodidad al llegar a su establecimiento. En un futuro desea comprar una freidora de papas industrial, entre otros utensilios. Su meta es poner más de una pizzería en la ciudad donde vive.
texts.en:
Johanna is a charismatic youth who loves to work. She decided to start her first business taking advantage of her talent in the kitchen. With the help of her mother she risked opening a pizzeria in her house. She has had the benefit of one loan from KIva together with MiCrédito, with which she bought a display case and raw material to make the pizzas.

Now that her business is more profitable she wants to grow. So she is requesting a new loan which will allow her to buy chairs and tables to offer her clients more comfort when they come to her business. In the future she wants to buy an industrial chip fryer amongst other equipment. Her goal is to open more than one pizzeria in the city she lives in.

loans.use: to buy chairs and tables.

loans.name: Josefa Esperanza

texts.es:
Josefa Esperanza tiene 45 años de edad, vive en casa familiar junto a su cónyugue y su dos hijos de los cuales uno es menor de edad.Ella vive en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén, ubicada en la Región cajamarca, Sierra norte del perú.

Ella se dedica al servicio de transporte,esta actividade las realiza en el distrito de Pucará y sectores, el destino del crédito será para invertir en mantenimiento de su vehículo motor para la labor que realiza y así generar mayores ingreso y mejorar su calidad de vida .
texts.en:
Josefa Esperanza is 45 years old. She lives in a family house with her partner and their two children, one of whom is underage. She lives in the rural part of the Pucará district, Jaén province, located in the Cajamarca region of the northern mountain range of Peru. 

She makes a living providing transport service. She does this activity in the Pucará district and surrounding areas. The loan will be used to invest in maintaining her motor vehicle for the work she does, thus generating greater earnings and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to maintain her motor vehicle for the work she does

loans.name: Anima

texts.en:
Anima lives at a small village of Falakata in West Bengal. She is 28 years old and a hard-working mother of two children (a son and a daughter). The children are students in grade 2 and 7 respectively. 

Her husband is a farmer and he works hard to meet the family needs. Anima also helps her husband with cultivation during busy seasons. The harvests are sold in the market which is the sole source of income to earn their livelihood. But they can hardly meet the household expenses and educational fees of their children. Now they have decided to grow pointed gourds which are a very popular summer crop.

So Anima applied for a loan from Kiva’s partner BJS to purchase good quality seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides for pointed gourd cultivation. 

She hopes to get a huge profit from the cultivation of this crop in the summer season that will improve her family’s financial condition. It will also enable her to expand her agricultural business in future with the profit generated by this cultivation.

Anima is thankful to her lenders for their help.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural inputs for pointed gourd cultivation.

loans.name: Hamzah

texts.en:
Hamzah is an example of an ambitious guy; he is 19 years old, and he lives in Irbid with his family that consists of nine members. 

Hamzah is studying in his fourth year to take his bachelor's degree in computer science. Lately, he has faced a financial crises that led him to apply for an education loan to help cover the rest of his semester fees and achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to help him to cover the rest of his semester fees

loans.name: Anju

texts.en:
Anju, 29 years old, lives in Boro Shoulmari village in Falakata. She is a married woman who resides in their own kachha house (made of wood, straw and mud) with her family. She has a son studying in grade 5 in local village school.

Her husband runs a poultry farming business. Anju helps her husband in this business. They buy chicks from the market, raise them, and when they mature they sell them at the market. Anju is a young, idealistic entrepreneur; she always looks for growth. She now wants to expand their poultry farm, for which she is asking for a loan from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to buy more chicks for breeding.  She will also buy fodder and medicines for the chicks with the help of this loan. 

Anju is confident that the expansion will surely give her enough income to maintain her family and help her save enough money for her son’s education.
 
She is grateful to her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase chicks, medicines, and fodder to expand their existing poultry farm business.

loans.name: Beauty

texts.en:
Beauty is a loving and hardworking mother of two children (one son and one daughter). She is 38 years old and she has a secondary school education. She lives with her children and husband, Shibesh, in Falakata in the district of Alipurduar in their own concrete house. 

Her husband works in a plywood manufacturing mill by trade. Her children are students in local higher secondary schools. Beauty always gives priority to her children's future, that is why she works tirelessly to give them a better way of life. She has her grocery store at the front side if her home where various kinds of grocery items are sold. She has chosen this business for an additional contribution to her family and as there are very few other grocery stores in her locality.

Now she aims to improve her grocery shop due to the increasing demand of her customers. To achieve this, she needs capital. So she applied for a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to buy grocery items like biscuits, bread, butter, spices, flour, oil and others in bulk to meet the demand of her customers and at the same time, improve her financial stability for providing a decent life to her family.

Beauty wants to save money for her family from the profit generated from her grocery business so that she can use it in emergencies.

She is thankful to both BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase more grocery items for her grocery shop.

loans.name: Ghaith

texts.en:
Ghaith is studying in university majoring in marketing. After he succeeded in high school, he was not able to get a scholarship because of his rating.

Lately, his family has been facing financial problems that prevent his father from paying the university fees for him. Therefore, Ghaith had to apply for an education loan to cover the semester fees and achieve his dreams.

loans.use: to cover the semester fees and achieve his dreams

loans.name: Deyanira

texts.es: Deyanira tiene la edad  de 58 años, está casada y vive con el esposo  y cuatro hijos actualmente. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de fertilizantes, fungicidas y pagar mano de obra en trabajos de asistencia para el café. Con estas mejoras al cultivo espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Élla no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Deyanira is 58 years old, is married, and lives with her husband and their four children. She would like to use a loan to purchase fertilizers and fungicides and to pay workers to help with her coffee crops. With these improvements to her crops, she hopes to earn some money so that she can improve her family's living conditions.

This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not received loans from other institutions, but FUDECOSUR has provided a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and fungicides and to pay workers to help with her coffee crops.

loans.name: Haguruka Group

texts.en:
Ismael is a group leader; aged 49 years. She is married with five children aged between 11 and 25 years. Her group is called "Haguruka", which means “Standup” in English. 

The group sells different products and they wish to expand their business to change their future. 

Ismael sells fish and has been running a business for seven years. With the loan, she would like to buy more fish to sell. The profits from the business will be used to expand her business and renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy more fish to sell

loans.name: Jessenia

texts.es: Jessenia tiene la edad de 30 años, está casada   y vive con el esposo y  tres  hijos   actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de unos cerdos pequeños y el concentrado para su alimentación .Ella espera poder engordarlos y venderlos con el peso ideal y  así tener mayores ingresos económicos. Ella espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jessenia is 30 years old, is married, and lives with her husband and their three children. She would like to use this loan to purchase young pigs and concentrated feed for them. She hopes to fatten them and sell them when they reach an ideal weight so that she can earn more income. In the future, she hopes to provide a better quality of life and better economic stability for her family so that they can continue to grow. 

This is her first loan with FUDECOSUR. She has not received other loans from other institutions, but FUDECOSUR has offered a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Miya Ajima

texts.en:
Ajima is a rural woman of 54 years. She is from Chuakhola village in Falakata, Alipurduar district. She is illiterate but can sign her name only. She lives with her husband and one son in a small kaccha (mud and straw) house. 

Her husband is a farmer and her son is a carpenter because he was deprived of education due to their poverty. Her husband grows vegetables and other crops to sell the produce in the market and Ajima assists him in farming. Now she wants to grow paddy as it is one of the high-demand crops throughout the year, being the staple for the people of their region.

 Ajima has chosen to start paddy cultivation on their farmland for additional income. So she has taken the economic support from BJS (Kiva’s partner) to buy agricultural supplies such as good quality paddy seeds, fertilizers, and other farm resources for paddy cultivation. 

Ajima is a tenacious woman who is ready to give her best effort for the betterment of her family. Her long-term goal is to go ahead with paddy cultivation and in future she dreams of building a concrete house for her family.

She thanks BJS and Kiva.

loans.use: To purchase agricultural supplies for paddy cultivation on their farm land.

loans.name: Anju

texts.en:
Anju is a 32-year-old independent woman from Bara Soulmari, a remote village of Falakata in the state of West Bengal. She lives with her husband and three daughters. Her two daughters are now students and one is still quite young. 

Her husband is engaged in a goat-reselling business. Anju helps her husband in this business. Apart from managing household jobs, Anju also takes care of their goats. They purchase baby goats from the market and after the goats are grown, they sell them to the local market shops for meat. This is the only source of income for the family. Since there is a consistent demand of goats in their locality, they see this as an opportunity to flourish and want to scale up their business by buying more baby goats. This venture will require good revenue. 

So as a responsible wife, Anju is seeking a loan from BJS( Kiva's partner) for baby goat purchasing. This loan will help them increase their savings and secure their family’s future.

Anju is very happy and thanks her lenders.

loans.use: To purchase goats for her husband’s micro- enterprise.

loans.name: Agustín

texts.es: Agustín es un joven emprendedor, se dedica a la crianza de pollos , solicita un préstamo de $250, con este dinero comprará 70 pollitos, alimento y medicamento para los mismos. Con esta inversión pretende aumentar sus ingresos, ya que de esta actividad dependen él y su hijo.
texts.en: Agustín is an enterprising young man.  He raises chickens.  He is requesting a loan for $250.  With this money he will buy 70 chicks, feed, and medicine for the chickens.  With this investment he plans to increase his earnings.  He and his son depend upon this business activity.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten.

loans.name: Cristobalina

texts.es: Doña Cristobalina es madre soltera, con 20 años de criar pollos para el engorde y venta de los mismos. Con un préstamo de $500 puede comprar 150 pollitos y 12 sacos de alimento para los mismos. Con esta inversión generará más producción, incrementará ventas e ingresos.
texts.en: Cristobalina, age 20, is a single mother.  She raises chickens to fatten and sell.  With a loan of $500 she will buy 150 chicks and 12 sacks of feed for them.  This investment will generate greater production, and it will increase sales and earnings.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy farm inputs for use on the farm.

loans.name: Doris Elizabeth

texts.es: Doris es una joven emprendedora, con siete años de experiencia en el cultivo de hortalizas. Ha solicitado un préstamo de $250 para la compra de mil plantones de ají (chile) e insumos para la siembra de los mismos. Con la cosecha incrementará sus ingresos de los cuales dependen sus dos hijos.
texts.en: Doris is a young entrepreneur with 7 years of experience growing vegetables. She has requested a loan for $250 to purchase 1,000 chile plant saplings and supplies to plant them. The harvest will increase her income, which she needs in order to support her two children.

loans.use: to purchase chile plant saplings and supplies.

loans.name: Leandro

texts.es: Don Leandro cultiva la Caña de azúcar, tiene un trapiche artesanal donde produce el dulce de caña, sin embargo  este está bastante dañado, por lo que necesita un préstamo de $ 200 para comprar un nuevo trapiche, esta actividad es la única fuente de ingresos con la que cuenta.
texts.en: Leandro grows sugar cane. He has an artisan mill that he uses to produce the sugar, but it is damaged. He needs a loan for $200 to purchase a new mill. This business is his only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase a mill.

loans.name: Clement

texts.en:
Clement is 34 years. He is married with two children ages 1 and 3 years old. One of his children goes to school, and Clement goes to school as well. He enrolled in 2014 and plans to graduate in the year 2016. 

Clement is requesting a school fees loan in order for him to be able to pay the whole sum of money at once, because he can only afford to pay it in installments.

loans.use: to pay his school tuition up front.

loans.name: Abdalla

texts.en:
Abdalla is a single man living in Baqaa. He is studying to get his bachelor's degree in surveying engineering, and he is now in his second year. 

The income that is coming from his father’s job is not enough to cover all the household expenses. Recently, Abdalla's father has faced some problems that led Abdalla to apply for an educational loan to help him cover his semester fees. 

Abdalla's future plan is to work in the same field and help his family.

loans.use: to help him cover his semester fees.

loans.name: Rolando Jesus

texts.es: Rolando Jesús tiene la edad de 55 años, está casado   y vive con la esposa  actualmente. El crédito lo quiere para la compra de unos novillos pequeños  .El espera poder engordarlos y venderlos con el peso ideal y  así tener mayores ingresos económicos. El espera en un futuro brindarle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y una mayor estabilidad económica, y de poder seguir creciendo. Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rolando Jesús is 55 years old, is married, and lives with his wife. He would like to use this loan to purchase some young heifers. He hopes to fatten them and sell them when they reach an ideal weight so that he can earn more money. In the future, he hopes to be able to provide his family with a better quality of life and more financial stability, and to continue to grow.

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not received loans from other institutions, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Saraswati

texts.en:
Saraswati is a 24-year-old young married woman from a small village in Falakata, Alipurduar district of West Bengal. She is an active and energetic woman who lives there with her husband and their only son. She is a woman of strong determination and perseverance through which she has achieved success in her small milk-selling business. 

Saraswati's husband, 32-year-old Haradhan, is engaged in a local jewelry-making shop. Her husband’s income is not adequate, so the family has had to depend on Saraswati's small-scale business of rearing cows and selling milk. With this income she bears the lion's share of her family's household expenses compulsorily  and can save only a small amount towards emergencies, which is not sufficient to face the growing inflation and cover the household needs adequately. 

To improve their financial and living situation, Saraswati wants to increase the earning potential of her milk-selling business. So she seeks a loan from BJS (Kiva's partner) to buy a dairy cow, which will allow her to sell more milk. It will help her to take the necessary steps towards ensuring the financial stability of her family and a secure future. Later on she dreams of making a concrete house for her family. 

She thanks her generous lenders.

loans.use: To purchase a dairy cow for her milk-selling business.

loans.name: Silvino

texts.es: Silvino es un joven trabajador, vive con sus padres y solicita un préstamo de $500 para reparar su vivienda , ya que está en malas condiciones , con este dinero comprará una ventana francesa, una pila para lavar ropa y materiales para su instalación, de este modo desea mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Silvino is a hardworking young man. He lives with his parents and is asking for a loan of $500 to repair his home, as it is in poor condition. With this money he will buy French-style windows, a sink to wash clothing and materials to install these. In this way he wants to improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy material to improve his family's home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay tuition

loans.name: Octaviza

texts.es: Doña Octaviza se dedica a la crianza de cerdos, para su engorde y venta. Solicita un préstamo de $500 con el que comprará 4 cerdos pequeños y reparará la galera donde los tiene. Con esta inversión mejorará las condiciones de cría de los cerdos y aumentará la producción, generando así más ingresos .
texts.en: Octaviza raises pigs to fatten and sell.  She is requesting a loan of $500 to buy four small pigs and to repair the pen where she keeps them.  With the investment the conditions in which she raises the pigs will improve, and production will increase, generating more income.

loans.use: to buy four pigs and to improve their pen.

loans.name: Vano

texts.en:
Vano is 23-year-old married man from Tbilisi city, the capital of Georgia. He has a wife and an infant son. 

Vano is the only breadwinner for the family and works as a cook at a local restaurant. However, the family members find it hard to have normal living conditions and need an additional source of income. Vano sought credit among local financial institutions, but his attempts were unsuccessful because of his poor living conditions. 

The startup program, which is joint initiative between Kiva and Credo, enables people to get a loan for starting or re-starting businesses. His application was approved under the framework of this program to get a loan of 1100 USD for purchasing all needed machinery and equipment for opening a car wash service. 

After the business is started, the family will have stable source of additional income and the family members will make savings for further well-being. Vano and his wife rely on the good will of Kiva lenders and will be very thankful for the support.

loans.use: to purchase equipment to open a car wash service.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in iron, cement, brick and sand to reinforce the retaining wall and to build a sink.

loans.name: Isidora

texts.es: Doña Isidora ha criado pollos de engorde y ponedoras para la venta de carne y huevos durante gran parte de su vida. Con el préstamo de $500 que está solicitando comprará un centenar de pollitas ponedoras y alimento . Esto le permitirá disponer de mayor producto, ampliar su mercado y generar más ingresos.
texts.en: Isidora has raised chickens for meat and eggs for a large part of her life. With the $500 loan that she is requesting, she will purchase 100 egg-laying hens and food for them. This will allow her to have more product, expand her market, and generate more income.

loans.use: to purchase egg-laying hens.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy brick, sand, cement, stones and iron to build a house.

loans.name: Yelgis Maricín

texts.es: Yelgis es una joven emprendedora dedicada a la crianza de pollos de engorde. Está solicitando un préstamo de $250 para comprar 50 pollitos y alimento para fortalecer su criadero. De esta manera espera ver crecer su pequeña empresa  y por supuesto incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Yelgis is a young entrepreneur who makes a living by raising and selling chickens. She is requesting a loan of $250 to purchase 50 chicks and chicken feed to improve her breeding center. This way, she hopes to see her small business grow. She also hopes to increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase chicks and chicken feed.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia tiene 47 años de edad, conviviente, tiene 2 hijos, vive con su familia en este mismo distrito de Oyotún, en una zona rural, dicho distrito pertenece a la Provincia de Chiclayo, Región Lambayeque, Costa Norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallinas, gallos, pollos, cerdos, chivos,entre otros, con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio,está ubicado en su mismo domicilio, solicita préstamo para compra de más animales,y alimento para su engorde; dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales; ella piensa incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender las diversas gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona de esta forma generar mayores ingresos por lo tanto mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Lucia is 47 years old, is married, has two children, and lives with her family in the district of Oyotun. Oyotun is a rural area in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region on Peru's northern coast.

She makes a living by raising and selling animals like ducks, chickens, hens, roosters, pigs, goats, etc. She has more than 10 years of experience in this business, which is located in her home.

She requests a loan to purchase more animals and food to fatten them. This investment will allow her to have a greater variety of animals and greater productivity. She would like to increase her stock of animals in order to attend to the diverse tastes and needs of her customers in the zone. This way, she can earn more money and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more animals and food to fatten them.

loans.name: Gulomjon

texts.ru: Гуломчон молодой житель района Кубодиён. Ему 33 года. Она женам и имеет маленького ребенка. Гуломчон занимается растениеводством. В работе его поддерживает его любимая жена. Гуломчону сейчас нужно собрать урожай и посадить новый. Для этого ему необходимо купить семена и минеральные удобрения. Для всех этих средств у него не достаточно денежных средств и, обратился за кредитом. Он очень надеется, что ему не откажут в кредите, и он сможет купить семена и минеральные удобрения.
texts.en: Gulomjon is a young resident of the Qubadiyon region. He is 33 years old. He is married and has a small child. Gulomjon is a crop farmer. His beloved wife supports him in his work. Now Gulomjon needs to gather his harvest and plant a new crop. He needs to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer for this. He does not have enough funds for all this and he has applied for a loan. He very much hopes that he will not be refused a loan, and that he will be abl eto buy the seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for agriculture.

loans.name: Teopista

texts.en:
Teopista lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with two children and both go to school. She has no additional family members. 

Teopista operates a pub in a shop that she rents. She has been in this business for the last four years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested for a loan of UGX 500,000 from Micro Credit for Development and Transformation SACCO (MCDT SACCO) to buy crates of beer, soda, and spirits and boxes of mineral water. 

Her major challenges include defaulters and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations are to buy a refrigerator and better chairs with which to serve her customers. She lives in rented house and the family has no access to piped water and electricity. Her major monthly expenses include school fees.

loans.use: to buy crates of beer, soda, and spirits and boxes of mineral water.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy: cement, iron, metal sheets and sand to repair the plumbing and the door in her home.

loans.name: Candy Lucia

texts.es:
Candy Lucía 29 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijas a su cargo, vive en casa familiar, Domiciliada en la av. Jose olaya del Distrito de Oyotun,Provincia de Chiclayo, Región Lambayeque, Costa norte del Perú. Los pobladores de esta zona rural, se dedican mayormente a la agricultura, ganadería y comercio.

Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y calzado para damas caballeros y niños, hace 2 años, negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio; solicita préstamo para invertir en capital de trabajo; compra de variedad de ropa,calzado, entre otros, esto le servira para poder satifacer los gustos de sus clientes y asi poder incrementar sus ventas, generar mayores ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Candy Lucia is 29 years old, is single, and has two children. She lives in her family's home, which is located in the district of Oyotun in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque region of Peru's northern coast. The majority of the residents of the rural zone work in agriculture, cattle farming, and commerce.

She makes a living by selling clothing and footwear for men, women, and children. She has had this business for 2 years and it is located in her home. She requests a loan to invest in working capital. She will purchase a variety of clothing, footwear, and other things. This will allow her to meet her customers' needs so that she can increase her sales, earn more money, and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to invest in working capital and purchase a variety of clothing, footwear, and other things.

loans.name: Mujeres Comerciantes Group

texts.en:
The Friendship Bridge Trust Bank “Mujeres Comerciantes” is located in Quiche in the Western Highlands and was formed by eight women. These women want to create a future where they can meet the economic needs of their families, send their children to school and generate more income. The “Microcredit Plus” program of Friendship Bridge, that combines small loans and educational trainings, is an effective vehicle for them to make progress toward these goals. They find the educational trainings to be very helpful that they receive in their monthly trainings. A Facilitator from the organization, shares beneficial information with the women in their own native language about the world around them and within them. The women learn through role playing, stories and drawings. Some topics discussed include hygiene, health and the use of medicinal plants, self-esteem and empowerment as well as teenage pregnancy and violence against women. The ladies learn to effectively manage their loans and expand their small businesses with information about budgeting, pricing, marketing, customer service and accounting.

Rosa is a member of the Trust Bank with one son. She is a street vendor and sells beauty products as well as donuts. She is soliciting a new loan that she will use to buy beauty products like creams, lotions, powders, perfumes and make up. Rosa will use another part of her loan to buy flour for her donut business. She is very pleased to be making an income as she can send her son to school. He is in his first year of university studies!

Rosa and her friends in the Trust Bank are very appreciative of KIVA investors who fund their loans. They could not walk into a bank to secure funds so this is really a wonderful opportunity for them. Thank you, KIVA investors!

loans.use: to buy beauty products like perfume, cream, talcum powder, lotions, make-up and also to buy flour to expand her business selling donuts.

loans.name: Jose Misael

texts.es: José de 39 años de edad, es una persona casada y responsable de 2 hijos de 2 y 5 años de edad con los que habita en casa propia al lado de su esposa. José quien hace varios años  desempeña el cargo público de seguridad a la sociedad en general, con el cual ayuda a su familia para cumplir todas sus necesidades diarias dentro del hogar, además cuenta con una pequeña granja de gallinas en su vivienda la cual le permite obtener mejores ingresos económicos. José desea un apoyo para poder mejorar su vivienda y para ello busca obtener un crédito a través de  FUSAI y así poder llevar acabo dicho mejoramiento que consiste en la construcción de una pared e instalar ladrillo de piso por lo cual tiene que invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, hierro y ladrillo de piso para instalar ladrillo de piso y construir la pared de su vivienda y de esta manera brindar una mayor seguridad a su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is 39 years old, is married, and has two children, ages 2 and 5 years. He lives with his wife and children in his own home. Jose has worked for several years as a public security professional, which helps him to provide all of the daily necessities to his family. He also has a small chicken farm at his home, which allows him to earn more money.

Jose would like support to improve his home, so he requested a loan from FUSAI so that he can perform the improvement on his home. He would like to build a home and install a brick floor, so he needs to invest in cement, sand, gravel, iron, and brick floor tiles. This will allow him to build the wall and install a brick floor so that he can provide more security for his family.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, iron, and brick floor tile to install a brick floor and build a wall in his home.

loans.name: Juan Hugo

texts.es:
Juan Hugo tiene 33 años de edad, conviviente, tiene 1 hijo, vive con su familia en el mismo distrito de Oyotún, que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo, Región Lambayeque, costa Norte del Perú.

Él se dedica a brindar los servicios de jornalería, contando con herramientas propias, con más de 11 años de experiencia en el negocio, negocio esta ubicado en su mismo domicilio, como se puede observar en la foto aparece con una mototaxi en la cual transporta sus herramientas, requiere préstamo para mantenimiento de dicha mototaxi, dicha inversión le servirá para tener en mejores condiciones sus equipos y herramientas, con gran influencia en el negocio; Juan Hugo piensa mejorar productividad de sus servicios y así poder atender las diversas necesidades de los clientes de la zona, generar mayores ingresos y así mejorar su calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Juan Hugo, 33, is married and has a son. He lives with his family in the  Oyotún district which is located in the Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region in the northern coast of Peru. 

He is a day laborer with his own tools. He has 11 years of experience in the business. His business is located in his home which can be seen in the photo where he appears with his motorcycle taxi. 

This loan will help him maintain his equipment and tools which highly influence his business. 

Juan Hugo wants to improve his productivity and in this way be able to serve his clients with different needs in the area, generate a bigger income and  improve the quality of life for his family.

loans.use: maintenance for his motorcycle taxi used to transport his work tools.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a hard-working 16 year old who lives in the town of Kaliro in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is single and has no children. For the past three years, Mary has been working hard to manage her retail shop, which sells cold drinks, sugar,and posho flour. 

To help expand her business, Mary has requested a loan of 200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy a bigger refrigerator and will help Mary generate greater profits and purchase clothes. Mary hopes that in the future she will be able to open up a grocery store. 

Mary is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy a bigger refrigerator

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a hard-working 20 year old and lives in the town of Kaliro in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is married and has one child. For the past four years, Mary has been working hard to manage her food stall selling snacks. 

To help expand her business, Mary has requested a loan of 600,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more pancakes, doughnuts, and sambusa (meat pie), and will help Mary to generate greater profits and earn profits. Mary hopes that in the future she will be able to own a retail shop. 

Mary is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more pancakes, doughnuts, and sambusa (meat pie).

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a hard-working woman. Juliet is 23 years old and lives in the town of Kaliro in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is married and has one child. For the past six years, Juliet has been working hard to manage her shop, which sells medications. 

To help expand her business, Juliet has requested a loan of 800,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more tables, and will help Juliet to generate greater profits and look after her family. Juliet hopes that in the future she will be able to buy plot of land. 

Juliet is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more tables

loans.name: Justine

texts.en:
Justine is a hard-working 17 year old who lives in the town of Kaliro in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is single and has no children. For the past two years, Justine has been working hard to manage her shop, which sells medications. 

To help expand her business, Justine has requested a loan of 200,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more drugs, and will help Justine to generate greater profits and pay for her operational licence. Justine hopes that in the future, she will be able to complete constructing her house. 

Justine is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more medication

loans.name: Alfonso

texts.es:
Alfonso tiene 45 años de edad natural de San Lorenzo del distrito de Pimpingos,en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, Sierra Norte del Perú.Vive junto a su esposa y su 2 menores hijos, los cuales estudian en colegio primario del caserio San Lorenzo.

La actividad que realiza Alfonso es la cría y comercializacion de ganado vacuno, posee 13 reses de su propiedad, con dos Has. de inverna pasto natural de la zona, se dedica a la actividad pecuaria hace ocho años, cuenta con experiencia en el rubro, su ganado lo comercializa los dias domingo en la plaza de ganado vacuno en el distrito de Pimpingos de Cutervo, donde se reunen criadores, compradores de todo el distrito y sus caserios para ofertar el ganado que poseen. Adicionalmente se dedica al cultivo de café variedad catimor y productos de pan llevar.

El destino del crédito sera para compra y sanidad de ganado vacuno, con ello obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Alfonso is 45 years old. He is a native of San Lorenzo in the district of Pimpingos, Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the North Andes of Peru. He lives with his wife and two young children who attend primary school in the village of San Lorenzo.

Alfonso's business is raising and selling cattle. He owns 13 cows and two hectares of natural pastureland in the area. He has worked in agriculture for 8 years and has lots of experience in the field. He sells his cattle on Sundays in the cattle yard of the district of Pimpingos of Cutervo. Cattlemen and buyers from all the district and villages meet here to offer the cattle they have. He also grows Catimor varietal coffee and other basic food products. The loan will be used to buy cows and medicine for them. Doing this he will have more income to improve his quality of living.

loans.use: to buy cows and medicine for them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase stocks of manufactured hair pieces and shampoo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a fridge to supply soft drinks for sale.

loans.name: Lorena Del Carmen

texts.es: Lorena de 32 años de edad es madre soltera y responsable de dos hijos varones uno de 12 y otro de 6 años de edad a los que sostiene y les brinda lo necesario en el hogar como lo son estudio, salud, vestuario, etc. Lorena labora como presta sus servicios domésticos haciendo diversos oficios, desde hace varios años y para obtener ingresos adicionales en los días libres se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza donde ha conseguido hacer muchos clientes a los que satisface con sus buenos productos que distribuye. Lorena pretende ampliar la casa y al mismo tiempo hacer una reparación en una pila que le sirve como almacenaje de agua para uso diario, por lo que recurre a solicitar un crédito a FUSAI y así poder invertir en: piedra, ladrillo, cemento, arena, hierro y lámina para reparar la pila y construir un cuarto dormitorio.
texts.en:
32-year old Lorena is a single mother raising two children aged 12 and 6. She is responsible for all their needs including food, education, health, clothing etc. For several years Lorena has earned her living as a domestic servant; to earn more income on her days off she also sells beauty products and has many customers who like the quality products she sells. 

Lorena wishes to extend her house and at the same time make repairs to a sink which is used to store the water the family uses on a daily basis. For these reasons she is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy rock, bricks, cement, sand, rebar, and corrugated sheeting to repair the sink and build a bedroom.

loans.use: buy rock, bricks, cement, sand, rebar, and corrugated sheeting to repair the sink and build a bedroom

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting, wood and nails to replace the roof on his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy poultry

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en:
Gladys is a Kenyan woman from Kamaget village who is involved in dairy farming. Her work brings home an important source of income. Gladys is married and has children. The children help her with the work. 
Gladys applied for a loan because she needs to expand her dairy farm. She will buy an additional cow with the borrowed money. The cow financed by Kiva lenders will increase the quantity of milk she takes to the market and will boost her monthly income.  
Gladys needs more income to take care of her increasing family expenses and that is why this loan is important to her.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a hard working woman. She is 23 years old and lives in the town of Kaliro, in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is married and has 2 children, with 1 of them currently in school. For the past 3 years, Mary has been working hard to manage her saloon business, which deals in hair dressing.

To help expand her business, Mary has requested a loan of 900,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy braids, hair treatments, and chemicals, and will help Mary to generate greater profits and pay her children's school fees. 

Mary hopes that in the future she will be able to open up another branch.

Mary is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy braids, hair treatments, and chemicals for her hair salon.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary is a hard working woman. She is 17 years old and lives in the town of Kaliro, in the Iganga region of Uganda. She is single and has no children. 

For the past 3 years, Rosemary has been working hard to manage her charcoal-selling business. To help expand her business, Rosemary has requested a loan of 500,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to buy more sacks of charcoal, and will help Rosemary to generate greater profits and buy a kiosk to keep the charcoal. 

Rosemary hopes that in the future she will be able to start a restaurant. 

Rosemary is a member of BRAC's Empowerment and Livelihood for Adolescents (ELA) program. In addition to microfinance loans, the program provides both a safe place for young Ugandan women to take part in group activities, and a forum for life-skills training.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in metal sheeting, nails and wood to build her own room.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy meat to sell

loans.name: Santusa Leonora

texts.es:
Santusa continúa con su negocio de venta de comida rápida. El préstamo que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de insumos de cocina como; papas por arroba, salchichas por mayor y ollas para cocinar como, sartenes y planchas. El pago de sus cuotas los realizó a tiempo y sin problemas, “mi negocio está creciendo porque los clientes son continuos y me exigen ampliar el menú de comida…” comenta. La ventaja de su negocio es que cuenta con ventas diarias, la desventaja es la falta de un horno industrial para cocinar lechón al horno. Su sueño es mejorar su negocio, ella desea realizar la compra de un horno industrial para ampliar la oferta de comida y cocinar lechón al horno. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 6 años que se dedica a esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Santusa solicita un préstamo para la compra de un horno industrial para aumentar la oferta de comida y mejorar su negocio.
texts.en:
Santusa is continuing with her business selling fast food.  She invested her previous loan in the purchase of kitchen supplies. She bought potatoes in bulk, sausages at wholesale, and kitchenware such as pans and griddles.  She made her payments on time and without any problems. "My business is growing because I have regular customers and they want me to expand my menu," she comments.  

The advantage of her business is that she has daily sales, the disadvantage is that she lacks an industrial oven needed to cook "lechón" (roasted suckling pig).  Her dream is to improve her business.  She wants to buy an industrial oven to expand her food offerings with the addition of lechón and other dishes.  This is her 2nd loan cycle with the institution in the 6 years that she has had this business.

This is why Santusa is requesting a loan to buy an industrial oven to expand her food offerings and improve her business.

loans.use: to buy an industrial oven

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting, wood, and nails to replace the roof on his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting and wood to repair the roof on her house as soon as possible since it is now winter.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is a lovely woman from Kebenett village who is involved in dairy farming. She enjoys being a part of the agriculture sector because it provides a livelihood and an important source of income for her family. Over the years, Betty has been aiming for continual improvement of her livelihood, and today she is privileged to have access to finance through Kiva.

Betty applied for a loan because she needs to grow her dairy farm. She will buy an additional cow with the borrowed money. The cow, financed by Kiva lenders, will increase the quantity of milk she takes to the market and boost her monthly income.

Betty needs more income to take care of her increasing family expenses, and that is why this loan is important to her.

loans.use: to buy dairy feed for her cows.

loans.name: Segundo Narcizo

texts.es:
SEGUNDO NARCIZO TIENE 23 AÑOS DE EDAD,CON BUENAS REFRENCIAS,VIVE EN UNA COMUNIDAD TRANQUILA, DONDE LA GENTE SE DEDICA AL COMERCIO,GANADERIA Y AGRICULTURA, EN EL DISTRITO DE CAYALTI, PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO, REGIÓN LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DEL PERÚ.

ÉL SE DEDICA A LA CRIANZA Y COMPRA -VENTA DE ANIMALES MENORES, EN LAS FERIA DE LOS DIAS MARTES EN MERCADO PARADA NUEVA CAYALTI Y EN SU MISMO DOMICILIO.DESDE HACE MÁS DE 2 AÑOS APROXIMADAMENTE. TRABAJANDO TAMBIEN COMO VENDEDOR EN UNA CONOCIDA TIENDA COMERCIAL DE CAYALTI.

SOLICITA EL PRÉSTAMO PARA LA COMPRA DE ANIMALES, ALIMENTACIÓN Y OTROS GASTOS, PERMITIÉNDOLE PERCIBIR MAYORES INGRESOS, LO QUE GENERARÁ UN MEJORA EN SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
Segundo Narcizo is 23 years old and has good references.  He lives in a quiet community in the Cayalti district, Chiclayo province, and Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru, where people work in sales, livestock, and agriculture.

He works raising, buying, and selling small animals.  He sells at the market on Tuesdays and at the Parada Nueva Cayalti market and his home.  He has done this work for more than two years.  He also works as a salesman at a well-known store in Cayalti.  

He is requesting this loan to purchase animals, feed, and to cover other expenses.  This will allow him to earn more income, which will allow him to have a better quality of life.
